column1: ee bo sospane ke yane pela letswai
pela letswai pela mokotla wa letswai
tsamaya uye holata phate yane ya neuoe terateng
tsa rona le mme mamello di kae
o kae mme mme nkhono matlou
beha sekotlolo sane hodima nkho mane
kobo ena yahao uabona jwale etlaetsa
o kae hona tjee mme mataelo
o kae hona tjee mme mataelo
mm mme mamello ore ochakile wena
ha diperekisi dile siyo ha udule
uatseba mme mamello ore ochaketse wena
ubatla hore aqoqe le wena kajeko lena
ha urate hore etlere ha afihla amerika kwa aungolle
hakere keilekare utlobeha ka tlung ka moo
mme uiloselahla hape sepele sena saka
hakere keilekaujwetsa hore ubehe nyee ha utswa moo
ako bone ha uiloqhala dijo tjee
e ngata koro ena le kantle ka mane e teng
ake uekubute ka sekotlolong ka mona
hobane le yena hakere otlela le bohobe
perekisi ya tsenetu ke ena tsebo
a basadi rebona hantle ha hobutswe
mm utlaeja jwang mong wa yona antseaebatla
ufetwa ke nkeletseng kapo ufeta nkeletseng
ee hona tjee ontseaebatla hle manyeo
e eke sane pela watch mm
